features: PORTABLE AND LIGHTWEIGHT: You'll want this handheld steamer iron for clothes on hand for everything from cotton and wool to silk and synthetics. It's great for doing quick steaming and ironing touch-ups around your home and while traveling.
LESS WAITING: Quickly steam an outfit for work or while traveling. The 1200 watts provide fast, powerful wrinkle removal and heat up the steamer in just 45 seconds.
FEWER REFILLS: Enjoy up to 7 minutes of powerful steaming without stopping. The removable 120 ml water tank of this handheld steamer holds more water, so you can steam clothing and fabrics longer.
DOUBLES AS AN IRON: The nonstick ironing plate on the front of this steamer/iron heats up quickly to let you press out stubborn wrinkles, crease pants, iron shirts and more.

EASY TO USE AND PLENTY OF REACH: Simply plug in and press the steam button to release powerful steam to target wrinkles. As you steam, the extra-long 10 foot cord provides plenty of reach when you need it.
body.description: The Proctor Silex® Compact 2-in-1 Steamer/Iron is portable, lightweight and perfect for travel. It heats up fast and is ready to steam in just 45 seconds. Features intuitive one-button steaming, removable 120 ml water tank and detachable fabric brush.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Tested. Proven. Reliable products at reasonable prices. It’s not just a tagline, it’s what has lead our product development for decades. Every Proctor Silex appliance begins its journey in our engineering lab. Motors rotate, switches turn and mechanical arms spin for days on end, testing each function and feature. Then it’s off to the kitchen, where the staff uses the product much like you would – cooking and creating to ensure it will make your life a bit easier. Only when an appliance passes our rigorous testing do we know it’s ready for your home. Proctor Silex Compact 2-in-1 Iron & Garment Steamer, Removable 120 ml Water Reservoir, Detachable Fabric Brush The Proctor Silex Compact 2-in-1 Steamer/Iron has a portable, lightweight design that's perfect for travel and around the home. It heats up fast and is ready to steam in just 45 seconds. Just fill with water, plug in and press the steam button to target wrinkles with powerful steam. Need to iron clothes on a trip after unpacking? The nonstick plate on the front easily glides over every kind of fabric and presses out wrinkles right on the spot. Do you need to smooth some brand-new curtains? Simply attach the included fabric brush, which helps you send powerful steam deep into the fibers. Removable 120 ml water tank, you'll be able to steam for up to 7 minutes without refilling 1200 Watts and powerful steam pump, ready to use in 45 seconds Work steam deep into fibers with included fabric brush As you steam, the extra-long 10 foot cord provides plenty of reach

Portable and Lightweight You'll want this steamer/iron on hand for everything from cotton and wool to silk and synthetics. It's great for doing quick steaming and ironing touch-ups around your home and while traveling. Less Waiting Quickly steam an outfit for work or while traveling. The 1200 watts provide fast, powerful wrinkle removal and heat up the steamer in just 45 seconds. Fewer Refills Enjoy up to 7 minutes of powerful steaming without stopping. The removable 120 ml water tank holds more water, so you can steam clothing and fabrics longer.

Doubles as an Iron The nonstick ironing plate on the front of this steamer/iron heats up quickly to let you press out stubborn wrinkles, crease pants, iron shirts and more. Easy to Use and Plenty of Reach Simply plug in and press the steam button to release powerful steam to target wrinkles. As you steam, the extra-long 10 foot cord provides plenty of reach when you need it. Work Steam Deep into Fibers with Fabric Brush This steamer/iron includes a detachable fabric brush that's perfect for releasing stubborn wrinkles from thick, heavy clothing, curtains, linens and upholstery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EXCEEDED MY EXPECTATIONS
reviews.reviewText: This is exactly what I was looking for! Compact and light, this steamer packs a punch. I just received the product and I'll return to report any bugs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just need this! Toss the iron!
reviews.reviewText: I love this powder blue beast! It gets HOT and it gets hot FAST! So keep that in mind and protect your hands from the top, nonstick hotplate, and steam. I had a VERY wrinkly shirt and it needed to be steamed everywhere, including the sleeves. This baby took care of it in minutes. Only needed to fill the water resevoir once. Looked like a brand new shirt. I wish I took a before and after photo. Has a long cord, which I love. And the hotplate on the front doubles as an iron! 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Convenient, easy to use, traveler friendly find
reviews.reviewText: This is a really simple no frills way of steaming/ pressing lighter weight fabrics. I found it to be really user and travel friendly. It is light and convenient with a standard cord length that works well. This could take the place of a regular steam iron. On thicker material it may take a little more time and effort but that’s to be expected. Curtains are an easy fix with this steamer as well. Would recommend. Would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this to take with me on vacation. It is much lighter than a travel iron and I didn't have to worry that the iron that was in the hotel would stain my clothes. The description is spot on when it says it's ready in 45 seconds. No more waiting forever for the steam and 7 minutes of use is a long time. I have even used the steamer at home for some quick wrinkle fixes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Little Steamer
reviews.reviewText: This is a sharp looking steamer with a comfortable grip. It is easy to use right out of the box. Pretty intuitive, the instructions told me nothing I couldn't have figured out on my own. This steamer has a nice long cord, pretty great if the outlet is a distance away from the item being steamed. The grip is comfortable and the steaming button conveniently placed. I'm impressed with how smoothly the water reservoir locks on and off. The fabric brush is removable, exposing a little ironing plate that you could use in a pinch. While this unit is fairly compact, it is larger than other travel steamers I have seen. All in all though, this is a handy appliance to have around, for steaming curtains, clothing and the like. It's well designed and manufactured without any obvious flaws or blemishes. 5 Stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great for work attire
reviews.reviewText: This is marketed as lightweight and it is not very heavy but not super compact for a suitcase. I have utilized it at home for work items that I cannot iron like certain fabric. It comes out of the box read to use. It does not take very long to heat up and get ready for use. The tanks where you put the water does not leak which is different than some of the other steamers I have tried, which do leak. The tank can be fully removed, which is really nice to fill up, unlike the other steamers I have that do not come apart. The chord is pretty long and longer than some other steamers as well. It is easy to work and pretty self explanatory. It works well and gets wrinkles out of the clothing items after a few passes. I would recommend this steamer to anyone looking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great size... takes patience to dry chamber
reviews.reviewText: The size of this is EXCELLENT. I really like how small it is and the cord is quite lengthy (in a good way). My only complaint is that it's hard to dump out all of the "extra" water from the bottom chamber when you're done, so you have to let it finish drying on the counter for a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and compact. Great for quick jobs on folded curtains, table clothes and clothes
reviews.reviewText: Build quality:The quality is very good. It isn't what I would consider lightweight -- it actually feels pretty solid and substantial to me -- Yet I think it only weighs ~1.5lbs. The plastic is sturdy and the steam button has a good "click" feedback. The cord is a good quality and a good length ~10' which is about what you would expect. All in all I am VERY impressed with the qualityNo mess, Clean secure water tank.The water reservoir feels very well engineered and allows you remove it from the unit and fill it up separately. It can be closed after filling for transporting and it twists to lock in place on the steamer.UseWe use this a home for quick jobs. Its very easy to set up and use in a flash. The tank is enough for just about any one off job we have for steaming fabrics. It works very well and is very easy to handle especially on hanging items.Final ThoughtsThis is a great steamer for quick jobs. It is well made and works well. We highly recommend it.
